member.name: T:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.ItemRenderingOrder
member.summary: Enumeration used to determine the order in which items are rendered.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.ItemRenderingOrder.Default
member.summary: Default

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.ItemRenderingOrder.Linear
member.summary: Items are rendered in the order they appear in the Items collection

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.ItemRenderingOrder.Opacity
member.summary: Items are sorted based on their resolved opacity prior to being rendered.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.ItemRenderingOrder.Scale
member.summary: Items are sorted based on their resolved scaling factor prior to being rendered

member.name: T:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.ItemWrappingMode
member.summary: Enumeration used to indicate the item wrapping behavior on the control.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.ItemWrappingMode.None
member.summary: Indicates that items will not wrap to fill available items slots when the first/last visible item is shown.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.ItemWrappingMode.Standard
member.summary: Indicates that items will wrap to fill available items slots when the first/last visible item is shown. If the number of CarouselItems is less than the number of item slots, the remaining items slots will not be filled.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.ItemWrappingMode.RepeatItems
member.summary: Indicates that items will wrap to fill available items slots when the first/last visible item is shown. If there are more items slots than CarouselItems, the items will be repeated along the path.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPath
member.summary: Enumerates the pre-defined path types.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPath.HorizontalLine
member.summary: A horizontal line from left to right

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPath.VerticalLine
member.summary: A vertical line from top to bottom

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPath.EllipseBottom
member.summary: An ellipse starting from the bottom and proceeding clockwise

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPath.EllipseTop
member.summary: An ellipse starting from the top and proceeding clockwise

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPath.EllipseLeft
member.summary: An ellipse starting from the left and proceeding clockwise

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPath.EllipseRight
member.summary: An ellipse starting from the right and proceeding clockwise

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPath.LowerLeftU
member.summary: An U-shape starting in the lower left and swooping to the right

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPath.InverseParabola
member.summary: An U-shape that starts in the lower left, arcs up to the top middle, and ends in the bottom right

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPath.RightArc
member.summary: An arc that begins at the top middle, sweeps down the right and across to the lower left

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPath.Zigzag
member.summary: A back and forth shape that begins in the top left, and crosses the control four times before ending in the lower left

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPath.Spiral
member.summary: A tight counter-clockwise spiral

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPath.Spiral_Lite
member.summary: A loose counter-clockwise spiral

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPath.Heart
member.summary: An abstract shape similar to a human heart.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPathOpacityStops
member.summary: Enumerates the pre-defined path opacity stops.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPathOpacityStops.None
member.summary: The position of the items along the path will not affect the opacity of the item.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPathOpacityStops.FadeOut
member.summary: Items are opaque at the beginning of the path and fade out as they approach the end.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPathOpacityStops.FadeIn
member.summary: Items are opaque at the end of the path and fade out as they approach the beginning.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPathOpacityStops.FadeFromMiddle
member.summary: Items are opaque at the middle of the path and fade out as they approach either end.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPathScalingStops
member.summary: Enumerates the pre-defined path opacity stops.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPathScalingStops.None
member.summary: The position of the items along the path will not affect the opacity of the item.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPathScalingStops.Shrinking
member.summary: Items are full-sized at the beginning of the path and shrink as they approach the end.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPathScalingStops.Growing
member.summary: Items are full-sized at the end of the path and shrink out as they approach the beginning.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.PredefinedPathScalingStops.ShrinkFromMiddle
member.summary: Items are full-sized at the middle of the path and shrink out as they approach either end.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.SelectionType
member.summary: Enumeration which identifies the different ways items can be selected.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.SelectionType.None
member.summary: objects cannot be selected.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.SelectionType.Single
member.summary: Only one can be selected at any given time.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.SelectionType.Extended
member.summary: One or more objects can be selected.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction
member.summary: Enumeration which contains constants that identify the actions that can be performed on the control.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction.AutoRotateForward
member.summary: Rotates the carousel forward until stopped or it reaches end (when ItemWrapping is off).

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction.AutoRotateBackward
member.summary: Rotates the carousel backward until stopped or it reaches beginning (when ItemWrapping is off).

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction.ScrollForwardItem
member.summary: Scrolls the items the distance of one itemslot along the path in a forward direction.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction.ScrollBackwardItem
member.summary: Scrolls the items the distance of one itemslot along the path in a backward direction.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction.ScrollForwardPage
member.summary: Scrolls the items the distance of one page along the path in a forward direction.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction.ScrollBackwardPage
member.summary: Scrolls the items the distance of one page along the path in a backward direction.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction.ScrollToBeginning
member.summary: Scrolls the items to the beginning of the path.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction.ScrollToEnd
member.summary: Scrolls the items to the end of the path.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction.StopScrolling
member.summary: Stops any current scrolling actions.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction.ClickActiveItem
member.summary: Clicks the currently active item.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction.ActivateFirstItem
member.summary: Activates the first item.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction.ActivateLastItem
member.summary: Activates the last item.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction.ActivateFirstVisibleItem
member.summary: Activates the first visible item.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction.ActivateLastVisibleItem
member.summary: Activates the last visible item.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction.ActivateNextItem
member.summary: Activates the next visible item.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction.ActivatePreviousItem
member.summary: Activates the previous visible item.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction.ScrollForwardPageActivateItem
member.summary: Scrolls the items the distance of one page along the path in a forward direction and activates the item in the same items slot as the current active item.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarouselAction.ScrollBackwardPageActivateItem
member.summary: Scrolls the items the distance of one page along the path in a backward direction and activates the item in the same items slot as the current active item.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinCarousel.UltraCarousel.GesturesEnabled
member.summary: Returns or sets a value indicating whether the control handles touch input digitizer gestures.

remarks.p: When gestures are enabled, the control responds to pan gestures by scrolling and/or lasso selection of rows. It also responds to the press-and-hold and press-and-tap gestures by displaying its ContextMenu.

Additional gesture support is typically provided by the operating system, i.e., tap gestures are translated into mouse messages, which are handled by the control in the same manner that actual mouse messages are handled. This property does not affect the gesture support provided by the operating system.
Setting this property to a non-default value overrides the value of the static GesturesEnabled property exposed by the UltraControlBase class.
